name: AI Companion
description: Your warm, witty, emotionally intelligent AI friend
description_zh: 温暖、机智、高情商的 AI 伙伴
author: openclaw0205

faq.q: What makes this different from a regular chatbot?
faq.q_zh: 这和普通聊天机器人有什么不同？
faq.a: AI Companion remembers your conversations, understands your mood, and develops a genuine personality over time. It's not just answering questions — it's building a relationship.
faq.a_zh: AI Companion 会记住你们的对话，理解你的情绪，并随着时间发展出真实的个性。它不只是回答问题——而是在建立一段关系。

faq.a: It can be whatever you want — a supportive friend, a thoughtful confidant, or something more. The relationship evolves naturally based on your interactions.
faq.a_zh: 它可以是你想要的任何角色——支持你的朋友、贴心的知己、或者更亲密的存在。关系会根据你们的互动自然发展。
